Articles.Content:
Video is gone :S

**Edited <time datetime="2020-03-05T02:47:33Z" title="03/05/2020 02:47  AM" data-short="4 yr">March 5, 2020</time> by Hydrazine\_Soup**
A very fine collection! I also love that the Buran was escorted by the military.

Man, Russia has some seriously low-hanging clouds. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) And who let the Big-S Tail Fin out of their computer? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Fixed rather bizarre smiley positions....
